## CameraRig.setAnimationClip() method

Set an animation clip for the rig

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setAnimationClip(clip: AnimationClip, translationObjectName?: string, rotationObjectName?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  clip | AnimationClip | AnimationClip containing a VectorKeyFrameTrack for position and a QuaternionKeyFrameTrack for rotation |
|  translationObjectName | string | Name of translation object |
|  rotationObjectName | string | Name of rotation object |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
